name: vscord
description: üòé Another awesome and fully customizable VS Code extension to get Discord Rich Presence integration.

scripts.prebuild: yarn clean && yarn format && yarn lint

author: LeonardSSH <leonardssh22@gmail.com> (https://leonard.sh)

commands.title: Enables RPC in the current workspace.
Disables RPC in the current workspace

VSCord.id.description: Application ID. Change only if you known exactly what you're doing.

VSCord.appName.description: Choose the name you want the application to use.

VSCord.enabled.description: Controls if the Discord Rich Presence should show across all workspaces.

VSCord.detailsEditing.description:
Custom string for the details section of the rich presence
	- {null} will be replaced with an empty space
	- {filename} will be replaced with the current file name
	- {dirname} will get replaced with the folder name that has the current file
	- {fulldirname} will get replaced with the full directory name without the current file name
	- {workspace} will be replaced with the current workspace name, if any
	- {workspaceFolder} will be replaced with the currently accessed workspace folder, if any
	- {workspaceAndFolder} will be replaced with the currently accessed workspace and workspace folder like this: 'Workspace - WorkspaceFolder'
	- {currentcolumn} will get replaced with the current column of the current line
	- {currentline} will get replaced with the current line number
	- {totallines} will get replaced with the total line number
	- {problems} will be replaced with the count of problems (warnings, errors) present in your workspace.

VSCord.detailsIdle.description:
Custom string for the details section of the rich presence when idling
	- {null} will be replaced with an empty space.

VSCord.lowerDetailsNotFound.description:
Custom string for the state section of the rich presence when no workspace is found.
- {null} will be replaced with an empty space
	- {currentline} will get replaced with the current line number
	- {totallines} will get replaced with the total line number.

VSCord.largeImage.description:
Custom string for the largeImageText section of the rich presence
	- {lang} will be replaced with the lowercased language ID
	- {Lang} will be replaced with the language ID, first letter being uppercase
	- {LANG} will be replaced with the uppercased language ID.

VSCord.largeImageIdle.description: Custom string for the largeImageText section of the rich presence when idling.

default: Now with more than 90% less regressions.
Now with less than 90% more regressions.
It's not a dream... the release is real!
With a name like Pokemod, it has to be good.
Pokemod: Once you have it, you get hooked.
Pokemod: When 2nd best isn't good enough.
Pokemod: Toggles for the troubled trainer
Anyone gotten a strike? Multiple, in bowling!
Best thing you can do with your clothes on.
Would rather wait for the official source.
We are crazy, and almost harmless.
VSCord.funnyMessages.description: List of messages to pick at random and show when hovering the small icon.

VSCord.workspaceElapsedTime.description: Controls if the RPC should display elapsed time for a workspace or a single file.

VSCord.showProblems.description: Controls if the RPC should show the count of problems (warnings, errors) present in your workspace.

VSCord.problemsText.description:
Custom string of the text displaying the amount of problems in your workspace
	- {count} will be replaced by the respective amount of problems.

VSCord.ignoreWorkspaces.description: List of patterns to match workspace names that should prevent the extension from starting.

VSCord.checkIdle.description: Whether or not to check if you are still active or idle and react accordingly.

VSCord.idleTimeout.description: How long the window should be unfocused (in seconds) to count as Idle and/or switch small icon text.

VSCord.disconnectTimeout.description: How long the window should be unfocused (in seconds) to disable rich presence.

VSCord.idleText.description: Custom string of the text displaying if you're idle when hovering over the small icon.
